messages.subject: Re: Interesting Seasonal Ritual-----OH--Kmart---UNDIES--kids sleeping routines
messages.msgSnippet: Call the Salvation Army or St. Vincent DePaul or Goodwill.  One of them will have sponsored trees somewhere in your community. Lynda ... that ... of ... to
messages.messageBody:
Call the Salvation Army or St. Vincent DePaul or Goodwill. One of them
will have sponsored trees somewhere in your community.

Lynda

----------
> From: "Susan and Theodore" <Stuff@...>
>
> K-Mart.
>
> I went there and they said they were not going to have that tree thing
that
> someone mentioned (you pick the name off and buy that person
> stuff)....hmmmm--I asked why and the manager (they hire from
> within--remember my community)---shrugged her shoulders and said I don't
> know
> Maybe I could call a corporate number or something!!!!
>
> From: Lynda <lurine@...>
>
> I mean, I won't use someone else's cast off spatula (yuck) and
> > things like that. Oh, or undies <g> Gotta draw that line
> somewhere......*snippety do dah day*
>
> YEAH well I remember when I was so poor I was buying the extra large bag
of
> econo buy veggies and day old bread and sandwiches (free---from work) and
> YES that was me who bought the underwear from the thrift store---were you
> wondering?! *giggle---heee heeeee heeeee*
> SOS....I washed them several times!--probably paid for the extra cost of
> buying new in the wash!
>
> OH yeah and I wanted to ask......
> My kids are sometimes up until 2 AM
> AM I alone!
> In fact they are up right now making gifts for all the people they want
to
> "give" to .....
> They are quite content and enjoying themselves---all the wee ones that
> disturb their things (sometimes) are in bed!!!!
> thanks
> SOS---enjoy

messages.subject: Re: Interesting Seasonal Ritual-----OH--Kmart---UNDIES--kids sleeping routines
messages.msgSnippet: K-Mart. I went there and they said they were not going to have that tree thing that someone mentioned (you pick the name off and buy that person
messages.messageBody:
K-Mart.

I went there and they said they were not going to have that tree thing that
someone mentioned (you pick the name off and buy that person
stuff)....hmmmm--I asked why and the manager (they hire from
within--remember my community)---shrugged her shoulders and said I don't
know
Maybe I could call a corporate number or something!!!!

From: Lynda <lurine@...>

I mean, I won't use someone else's cast off spatula (yuck) and
> things like that. Oh, or undies <g> Gotta draw that line
somewhere......*snippety do dah day*

YEAH well I remember when I was so poor I was buying the extra large bag of
econo buy veggies and day old bread and sandwiches (free---from work) and
YES that was me who bought the underwear from the thrift store---were you
wondering?! *giggle---heee heeeee heeeee*
SOS....I washed them several times!--probably paid for the extra cost of
buying new in the wash!

OH yeah and I wanted to ask......
My kids are sometimes up until 2 AM
AM I alone!
In fact they are up right now making gifts for all the people they want to
"give" to .....
They are quite content and enjoying themselves---all the wee ones that
disturb their things (sometimes) are in bed!!!!
thanks
SOS---enjoy
